title: [Large-Scale] Flipped Learning Program for Academic English Presentations and Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Experience in Reading Academic Materials
context.additional_context: An advanced academic English course for general citizens aged 40+, combining blended learning environments with flipped learning methods (pre-learning via videos/readings and real-time activities like discussions/presentations)

learning_goals: Learners can structure a 5-minute English presentation using an academic presentation format (introduction-body-conclusion)
Learners can use complex sentences (e.g., logical reasoning and counterarguments) with 80% accuracy in academic discussions
Learners can revise and improve their presentation drafts at least twice based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
